home.tagline: From wall paintings to art workshops
home.taglineSub: - I create unique experiences that will stay in your memory.

wallPaintings.title: Wall paintings
wallPaintings.subtitle: Unique paintings for your space
wallPaintings.description: I create unique wall paintings that bring your space to life. From kids' rooms to business spaces - each painting is a unique story.
wallPaintings.offerText: Paintings for kids' rooms, kindergartens, schools, business spaces, cafes, and other public spaces. Each painting is designed according to your wishes and adapted to the space.
wallPaintings.ctaDescription: Get in touch for a free chat and quote.

biography.p1: I've been passionate about drawing and creating since childhood. I specialize in art for children - from wall paintings for children's spaces to illustrations for children's picture books and art workshops.
biography.p2: My work is based on the belief that children's motifs allow for endless imagination and the creation of stories that inspire and delight children. I enjoy sharing my artworks and creative process on social media, where you can follow my work.
biography.p3: I've already illustrated several children's picture books and had several exhibitions of my work. My work brings joy to families and inspires young artists.

paintings.title: Paintings
paintings.subtitle: Unique artworks
paintings.noResults: No paintings available at the moment.

cta.title: Want a custom painting?
cta.description: I'll create a unique painting just for you - from portraits to landscapes, in the technique of your choice. Each piece is a one-of-a-kind story, made especially for you.

cta.title: Need a photographer?
cta.description: I offer artistic photography for various occasions - from portraits to events. Get in touch for more information.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.subtitle: Art workshops for kids and adults
workshops.intro: Join creative workshops where you'll learn new techniques, enjoy the painting process, and take home your own artwork. Workshops are suitable for everyone - from beginners to experienced artists.
workshops.noWorkshops: No workshops scheduled at the moment.

benefits.title: What you get
benefits.subtitle: Every workshop includes everything you need to create - just show up!

materials.title: All materials included
materials.description: Paints, brushes, canvases and all other materials are included.

artwork.title: Take your artwork home
artwork.description: Your painting goes home with you as a lasting memory.

guidance.title: Expert guidance
guidance.description: I guide you step by step through the entire process.

refreshments.title: Refreshments included
refreshments.description: Drinks and snacks provided while you create.

fun.title: Fun atmosphere
fun.description: Relaxed and creative environment for all ages.
